title: Reporting a player after match, but disconnects
body: Lately I'm having a problem that after most Rift matches my game crashes. Theres nothing that can be don about the crashes I know that, my problem is that I am unable to report abusive/negative players at the end of the game and they will keep getting away with it. I would like to see a system in place to make it possible to report these players after the match from the home screen. This means they won't keep doing their bad sportsmanlike behaviours even if my game crashes as I have the ability to report them out of end game stats page. Please do this riot.

replies.body: Have you tried repairing yout client? That has fixed that issue for me personally in the past.
